name: Ninja Chicken Run Multiplayer HD Free
name_original: Ninja Chicken Run Multiplayer HD Free
description:
Ninja Chicken Run is an endless action run game. You play the role of Ninja Chicken - running bravely in the face of indomitable challenge from the Foxy the skillful hunter. Ninja is no easy bird - he knows his stuff. Defender of the pack, skillful avoider of trouble a true survivor. Gifted with the wings and solid foot work, he is off jumping and running without stop.

Avoiding and dodging obstacles, jumping through the complex layout of the farms and trees. Determined to the beak, no predator can outrun this nimble Ninja!

Never knowing what is waiting behind the bush, and invading the canny, nosy Foxy.

Features:
1. Endless running action
2. Nextpeer gaming integration
3. Stunning backgrounds
4. 13 levels
